column5: We are leaving Iowa Sunday afternoon .gonna hit the border shortly after midnight on the 9th. If there is a wrinkle at the border we will see it! Gonna be a cleanup/repair/pest control for at least a day since the shack hasn't been lived in for almost 2 years .can't wait!
The border guards are going on strike. Crossing then will be easy.

Looks like even the owners of the bridge at international falls are getting tired of it. I never would have guessed that it was not owned by the US and Canadahttps://www.ckdr.net/2021/06/12/brid...-fort-frances/
Maybe bill Kerr will buy it,I guess he has a lot of money
if no issues arise....40 days and counting
52 days unless I try to make a 2nd earlier run

12 days!! No Canada in a year and a half and suddenly I have 3 trips lined up. August 14-21 at Root Bay on Lake St. Joseph, then September 4-11 at the Eagle Island camp on St. Joe, followed by September 18-25 at the Winoga cabin on St. Joe. The week before us, September 11-18, just opened up at the Winoga cabin, but 3 weeks straight is more than I (and my understanding wife) could handle. I'll have to pass on that trip. So today's count is 12, 33 & 47!!

What a strange coincidence, I am also going to be at St Joe from August 14-21. Actually, I invited myself along and SJG reluctantly obliged. I think he may already be regretting that decision but it's too late to back out now. I'm already packed. Trip #2 is 52 days away. PJShorthorn and I will be at VbayGord's place on Eagle on September 22nd! Two awesome trips for me!
Sept 30 to Oct 10 is booked, however I've got a bad feeling about this border.
LoDo have all the right paper work ready,you'll zip right through when you get to an agent,reverse that bad feeling to good.
23 Days 20 Hours 42 Mins
That's a popular date rich
I always fish deeper in middle sept,but you never know,they can be shallow also,work it all emma17 until you hit pay dirt,just remember all lakes aren't the same
Can we get Fisherman Ted to chime in on this? Last week, he sounded so optimistic, and he sounds like he had a bit of inside info.
I think a lot of people will chime in after this week,we should know more this coming week
88 days until we are supposed to arrive at Birch Dale Lodge!!!!
I'm hoping that your trip is a go Narda
Hopefully this week a plan on the border is released. Whether it opens in July or October at least everyone will know where they stand. Lodge owners and hopeful fisherman can plan accordingly.
Thanks, I think it's still pretty iffy, but I hope it's a go.
With their track record of only doing 30 days in advance, I'm not very optimistic. Hopefully they will change their ways.
If they don't change there ways I'll have a talk with them and tell them narda has a trip in 88 days,and he must go on it,so get a opening date for the border and stick by it
Keep the faith port
3 months from today. September 11 leave IL, God willing fishing September 12.
It's gonna happen for us sept n oct boys,get the hooks sharpend up
Your on the bubble,could be close though,but sure as hel don't go by what I say,I'm just an ole tree trimmer
I told my outfitter to warn the fish that the grim reaper is coming sept 11
I told my outfitter to warn the fish that the grim reaper is coming sept 11
Whoops double post my fault
I haven't fished the second week of September before. I know the weather will do what it wants to do, but will the Walleye typically be out deeper that time of year?
Same plan as we’re leaving from IL to Red Lake late Sept 9
If I was a politician I would fire myself and every politician in the United States,I would hire one guy to run the show and that guy is Mr RichA,then it's 100% the border wall comes down
Brilliant! -FT

After all of them are fired my 1st order would to appoint Ambassador Eck to Canada and have him select a satellite embassy some where in Sunset Country so he could be based out of. Once he secured a safe entry process for our citizens, I would assign him to perform a study of the size of native fish across Canada.
That study would require me to wet a line in every province to do the study,absolute brilliant idea,Rich you are already up for a big pay raise
Think you will need a canadian ambassador in that deal wouldn't you think.

John your the official ambassador guide,payed in US dollars.We will see if this all pans out,I better ask my wife if i can be an ambassador to Canada,she might just want me stay here in mn and do chores at home
Time to restart the Countdown!?
January 22
I have my own count down,it's this fall,no need for any numbers
I'm feeling pretty confident about my Sept. 4th arrival in Perrault Falls. We missed 3 trips but our group is fully vaccinated and I'm working on the menu again!
Here we go again.
lol
Instead of guessing the ice out date, I think this year should be the open the border date.
February 2022
With ice out its a matter of a couple weeks historically this virus has no history
Were going to the Florida Keys 5/1/21 for walleye fishing in the Ocean. Were thinking a lindy rig and a crawler. Its also the crowning of Miss Tropicana at our hotel.
Looking forward to the pics in Florida,not of the walleyes but of miss Tropicana
I would hope for opening on June 6,but my best guess would be it will open someday
think your guess is right on
Not only a wise fisherman, but you could be a politician with that answer.
Greetings Walleye Central! This didn't go so well last year, let's try again anyway! First. when will the border open again! Second, how many days until your Canadian trip?

I have two planned. May 24th thru 30th and June 5th thru 12th. Bad news below,,,, maybe this fish camp is just not going to open but this email to me came today.Maybe they have enough Canadian business they cant save reservations for unknown US customers? I am not disclosing the fishing camp name as I just cut and pasted the email with nothing showing them. They are in NW Ontario and I do not have a reservation with them. I was told by both my fish camp owners April 1st would be a deciding date by the Department of Ministry. ATTENTION US GUESTS (ONLY US GUESTS) I was going to wait a day or two to write this email, but I can't. We just learned, if you're a US citizen with a 2021 reservation with ________  please be aware, the US/CAN border will remained closed for the foreseeable future. To be clear  US citizens will not be allowed entry into Canada for the 2021 season. As we did in 2020, we will credit all deposits to a future stay. The option to refund deposits does not exist; simply, it's not in our control and a very difficult decision. We will open up reservations to US citizens once we get confirmation the border will open and under what circumstances. Until then, it is pointless to keep taking reservations and cancelling them.
I just got the same email.
I just got that email too. I inquired about the resort, but never made a reservation.
I am hoping for a march opening. My next trip will be the first day the border opens.
Most people know it's not April first yet,if that is indeed when the notice comes

Many WC members will get the same email from Chad. Keep your fingers crossed. ATTENTION US GUESTS (ONLY US GUESTS) I was going to wait a day or two to write this email, but I can't. We just learned, if you're a US citizen with a 2021 reservation with Pasha Lake Cabins  please be aware, the US/CAN border will remained closed for the foreseeable future. To be clear  US citizens will not be allowed entry into Canada for the 2021 season. As we did in 2020, we will credit all deposits to a future stay. The option to refund deposits does not exist; simply, it's not in our control and a very difficult decision. We will open up reservations to US citizens once we get confirmation the border will open and under what circumstances. Until then, it is pointless to keep taking reservations and cancelling them. I will make myself available to talk to each one of you as questions come up  please call or text me at 715 817 4161 It seems this heavy heart is following us for the indefinite future obviously this is an email we'd rather not have to send. God Bless Chad & Michelle 715 817 4161

We're scheduled for a fly-in on July 31 - Aug 7. Let's hope they open the border to at least those who have documentation of immunization. My son got his first shot today. I'm hoping that the rest of us will be able to get ours by season opening.
This is the same letter that I got. I've never stayed there either nor do I have a reservation for this year.
being immunized does not preclude you from beng a carrier. let's hope for an open border but "hope is not a strategy". phish
